text: [Music]
greetings my name is Matt Wood and I'm
here at the AWS headquarters in Seattle
to give you an update on the AWS schema
conversion tool migrating databases from
one database engine to another is a
complex process and the schema
conversion tool makes this easier by
automatically converting The Source
database schema and much of the custom
database code to a format which is
compatible with the target database the
schema conversion tool so far supports
conversions from Oracle and SQL Server
to Aurora MySQL Maria DB and postgress
as well as conversions between postgress
and MySQL I'm pleased to say that
starting today the schema conversion
tool also supports conversions from the
Oracle data warehouse and Terra dat to
Amazon red shift the schema conversion
tool actively analyzes the application
database code of the source data
warehouse platform in order to provide
optimized ddl statements with
appropriate source and distribution keys
for Amazon red shift this will help you
reduce the complexity and accelerate
migrating your Oracle and teradata data
warehouses to redshift you can download
the AWS schema conversion tool from our
website and run it on your desktop today
thanks a lot
